topic: View Daylighting Analysis Results by DAYSIM 3.1b (beta)
body:
Dear All,


Despite multiple attempts, I'm unable to View Daylighting Analysis  
Results after import a project from Ecotect. When I click Analysis tab  
I only can view Zone description, Occupancy Profile, User Requirements  
and Behavior and Lighting and Shading Control System. Daysim I will  
not allow me to choose "View Daylighting Analysis Results" under the  
analysis pull down.


Thanks,
Urtza.
___
